name: Milo and the Magpies
summary: Milo and the Magpies is a point-and-click, hidden object game following the story of a little cat named Milo who is trying to find his way home after getting turned around by an unfortunate encounter with some pesky magpies.
info:
• 别名: 麦洛与喜鹊
  • 游戏类型: 指点向解谜
  • 发行日期: Q1 2021
  • 开发: Johan Scherft
  • 发行: Second Maze
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407420/Milo_and_the_Magpies/
